email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David Wilson,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with our initial freight quote for the transportation of 12,500MT of Coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 225m.

Our starting quote stands at USD 42.50 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 20 to October 25, ensuring minimal port turnaround time.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the current market conditions, could there be a possibility to review the rate? We are also interested in knowing the demurrage rate per day.

Looking forward to your revised proposition.

Best regards,
David Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Review for Coal Shipment: OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for your points regarding the current market conditions. After considering your request, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 40.00 per MT. The demurrage rate will be USD 15,000 per day.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Coal Shipment: OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 40.00 per MT. I would like to request further details on the laycan period and the vessel's loading rate to ensure there won't be issues during loading at Newcastle.

Also, could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Thank you,
David

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Coal Shipment: OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the laycan period remains as October 20-25. The vessel's loading rate is 5,000MT per day, which should align well with your requirements.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment Agreement: OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
David Wilson
